summary.span: Represents a collection of objects.

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和方法可讓您新增及移除個別控制項的集合。The , , and methods enable you to add and remove individual controls from the collection. 您也可以使用或方法來新增或移除集合中的所有控制項。You can also use the or methods to add or remove all the controls from the collection. 您可以判斷如果集合的成員會藉由傳遞至控制項方法。You can determine if a is a member of the collection by passing the control into the method. 若要取得的位置的索引值在集合中，以便將控制項傳遞至方法。To get the index value of the location of a in the collection, pass the control into the method. 集合可以複製到陣列，藉由呼叫方法。The collection can be copied into an array by calling the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例移除從衍生類別的如果它是集合的成員。The following code example removes a from the of the derived class if it is a member of the collection. 這個範例需要您已建立、 ，以及至少一個上控制。The example requires that you have created a , a , and at least one control on a . 控制項會加入至控制項，而控制項加入至。The controls are added to the control, and the control added to the . 當按一下按鈕時，選項按鈕命名為`radioButton2`被移除了。When the button is clicked, the radio button named `radioButton2` is removed from the . [!code-cpp[ControlCollection#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CPP/controlcollection.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[ControlCollection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CS/controlcollection.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ControlCollection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/VB/controlcollection.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您新增控制項集合的結尾的物件。The method allows you to add objects to the end of the control collection. 您也可以新增物件加入該集合使用方法。You can also add new objects to the collection by using the method. 若要移除您先前加入，請使用， ，或方法。To remove a that you previously added, use the , , or methods. > [!NOTE] > A只指派給其中一次。A can only be assigned to one at a time. 如果已經是另一個則會從控制項移除之前它就會加入另一個控制項的控制項的子系。If the is already a child of another control it is removed from that control before it is added to another control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將至衍生類別的。The following code example adds a to the of the derived class . 這個範例需要您已建立控制項和上控制。The example requires that you have created a control and a control on a . 按一下按鈕時，控制項會加入至面板。When the button is clicked, a control is added to the panel's . [!code-cpp[ControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CPP/controlcollection.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[ControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CS/controlcollection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/VB/controlcollection.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所包含的物件`controls`陣列會附加至集合結尾。The objects contained in the `controls` array are appended to the end of the collection. 您可以使用方法，以快速將群組新增物件加入該集合，而不是手動新增每個集合方法。You can use the method to quickly add a group of objects to the collection instead of manually adding each to the collection using the method. 若要移除您先前加入，請使用， ，或方法。To remove a that you previously added, use the , , or methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將兩個物件加入至衍生類別的。The following code example adds two objects to the of the derived class . 這個範例需要您已建立控制項和上控制。The example requires that you have created a control and a control on a . 當按一下按鈕時，兩個控制項會加入至面板。When the button is clicked, two controls are added to the panel's . [!code-cpp[ControlCollection#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CPP/controlcollection.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[ControlCollection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CS/controlcollection.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ControlCollection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/VB/controlcollection.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用方法從父控制項移除整個控制項的集合。You can use the method to remove the entire collection of controls from a parent control. 若要從集合中移除個別控制項，請使用或方法。To remove an individual control from the collection, use the or methods. > [!IMPORTANT] > 呼叫方法不會從記憶體移除控制項控點。Calling the method does not remove control handles from memory. 您必須明確呼叫方法，以避免記憶體流失。You must explicitly call the method to avoid memory leaks. 若要加入新物件加入集合中，使用或方法。To add new objects to the collection, use the or methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會移除所有中的物件衍生類別的。The following code example removes all the objects in the of the derived class . 這個範例需要您已建立、 ，和至少一個其他控制。The example requires that you have created a , a , and at least one other control on a . 其他控制項加入至控制項，而加入。The other controls are added to the control, and the added to the . 當按一下按鈕時，會從移除面板中所包含的所有控制項。When the button is clicked, all the controls contained in the panel are removed from the . [!code-cpp[ControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CPP/controlcollection.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CS/controlcollection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/VB/controlcollection.vb#1)]

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，以確保會從集合中移除所有的控制項。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method to ensure that all the controls are removed from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果稱為連續，最後一個傳回索引會檢查索引鍵的符合項目第一次，而且如果沒有相符項目，搜尋會從集合的開頭。If is called successively, the last returned index will be checked for a key match first, and if there is no match, the search starts at the beginning of the collection. 索引鍵的比較不區分大小寫。The key comparison is not case-sensitive. 如果`key`參數是`null`或空字串或使用指定的項目找不到索引鍵，傳回-1。If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, or an item with the specified key is not found, returns -1. 屬性對應至針對索引鍵中。The property of a corresponds to the key for a in the .

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetChildIndex(class System.Windows.Forms.Control child, int32 newIndex) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub SetChildIndex (child As Control, newIndex As Integer)
public: virtual void SetChildIndex(System::Windows::Forms::Control ^ child, int newIndex);

span.span: The child to search for.

param.name: newIndex
param.span: The new index value of the control.

span.span: The new index value of the control.

summary.span: Sets the index of the specified child control in the collection to the specified index value.

span.span: Sets the index of the specified child control in the collection to the specified index value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當呼叫時，所參考`child`參數會移至所指定的位置`newIndex`和其他參考適應移動已重新排列。When is called, the referred to by the `child` parameter is moved to the position specified by `newIndex` and the other references in the are reordered to accommodate the move. 具有索引值為零的控制項位於最上層的疊置順序，而較高的數字是愈接近下方。The control with an index value of zero is at the top of the z-order, and higher numbers are closer to the bottom.
